description: This table stores the wall motion data - segment, value and modifier.

columns.name: CV_FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the finding record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WALL_SEGMENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The wall segment being scored.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Anterior


Posterior


Lateral


Anteroseptal


Septal


Inferior


Intravascular septum


Anterolateral 


Inferolateral


Inferoseptal


Apex

columns.name: WALL_VALUE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The disease value for a wall segment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Normal


Hypokinetic


Akinetic


Dyskinetic


Aneurysmal


Mild count reduction


Moderate count reduction


Severe count reduction


Absence of Uptake


Hyperkinetic


Mildly Hypokinetic


Severely Hypokinetic


Severely Akinetic


Severely Dyskinetic

columns.name: WALL_MODIFIER_C_NAME
columns.description:
The location modifier for the wall segment.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Mid


Basilar


Apical
